resources.string:
welcome t' theotown 

this app be currently in development. be aware o' that there might be still some puny bugs. please d' nay vote down dis project fer those little issues. keep in mind that it's free. 

if ye like dis app ye might support us by telling yer crew about it. 

have fun :)
see through thin\'s in build mode
if ye verily want t\' hide ads then it would be nice t\' support us by telling yer crew about thar app. \n\nare ye sure?
may nay load thar city, thar file seems t\' be damaged.\n\nsorry.
thar picture has been saved as %1$s.
d\' ye verily want t\' delete?
be ye sure ye want t\' leave theotown?
please use another name fer yer city. it\'s nay allowed t\' be empty.
dis size be just experimental n\' may nay duty on yer device. d\' ye verily need a huge map?
every little town needs a church.
a vast city needs a city hall. habitants will like it.
use these wires t\' connect yer city wit\' yer power plants.
a wind turbine makes noise but nay pollution.
thar coal plant generates a lot o\' power, but also be bad fer environment.
solar panels be jolly good fer thar environment n\' they d\' nay pollute thar environment.
habitants will like thar vast park.
here habitants can see a doctor.
habitants feel safer near a hospital.
a place where children learn things.
a place where older children learn things.
a place where barnacle-covered scallywags learn things.
pipes can be used t\' bring grog t\' yer buildings.
theotown app fer android be a product o\'
prevents n\' extinguishes fires. has two cars n\' suitable radius.
thar gillender building. thanks fer 250,000 downloads :d
a place where young habitants can learn things when they be too barnacle-covered fer thar elementary school.
a little park wit\' trees. yer habitants will like it.
nay animals were harmed in production!
ye may try t\' tap on thar starboard bottom corner
there\'s a donate button on thar homepage
congratulations, yer city exceeds a size o\' %1$,d inhabitants!
a little park wit\' trees. yer habitants will like it.
might nay create save directory fer %1$s. please check app permissions.
residents will build houses in dis zone.
commercial buildin\'s can build in dis zone.
industrial buildin\'s will be built here.
cars can drive fast on it.
place some trees on yer map.
from here habitants can use thar bus t\' reach other parts o\' thar city.
a bus depot be needed t\' spawn buses.
ye can remove anything wit\' dis tool. except zones, pipes, tunnels n\' underground wires.
dis tool may be used t\' remove grog pipes.
a football field will make yer habitants happy.
let\´s sail t\' thar new open air bath.
a pavilion where parties may take place.
thar clock will tell thar scallywags thar current time.
there\'s nay much power left. ye may have t\' build new power plants.
ye have merely enough water. maybe ye should build new grog pumps.
may ye please build us some more religious buildings?
our jolly crew would like t\' have more parks.
our jolly crew want t\' make sports.
wit\' a roof games can be played in every weather.
congrats, ye unlocked thar upgrade %1$s fer building %2$s!
fire! send thar fire engines t\' extinguish thar fire. consider building more fire departments.
yer habitants will like thar radio program.
call thar police t\' stop criminals.
call thar fire brigade if something be burning.
when a accident happens ye have t\' call thar doctor.
sends thar newest news about thar city. improves knowledge. \n \nonly one radio program allowed at thar same time. barnacle-covered programs will be removed.

sends sports reports n\' exciting live broadcasts o\' sporting events. acts like a sports court wit\' very long range. \n \nonly one radio program allowed at thar same time. barnacle-covered programs will be removed.

sends mostly music n\' a light entertainment program. thar listeners feel better. so acts like a park wit\' very long range. \n \nonly one radio program allowed at thar same time. barnacle-covered programs will be removed.

sends conversations on thar subject o\' faith n\' our existence on earth. basically works as a house o\' worship wit\' a long range in thar city. \n \nonly one radio program allowed at thar same time. barnacle-covered programs will be removed.
nay ships far n\' wide, but there be a lighthouse .... strange.
ye can always show n\' hide thar minimap.
our jolly crew start wit\' building some road. select thar simpliest road type.
place thar road along thar marked tiles. t\' build it tap t\' set a start point, tap again t\' set thar end point.
great work! now close thar road tool.
let\'s try t\' build some solar panels.
place it on thar marked tiles.
ye can use wires t\' transport energy.
place it along thar marked tiles.
let\'s try t\' build a grog tower t\' provide some water.
place it on thar marked tile.
a grog tower alone isn\'t enough. ye need pipes in order t\' transport it.
place thar pipes along thar marked tiles.
great work. now ye can start wit\' declaring zones.
zones describe who can build where. there be three types o\' them.
let\'s declare a residential zone. habitants can build their houses there.
place thar zone on thar marked tiles.
let\'s continue wit\' a commercial zone. commercials will build there.
place thar zone on thar marked tiles.
last but nay least, industrial zones. that\'s where factories will be built.
place thar zone on thar marked tiles.
great work. now buildin\'s will be built.
ye should keep industrial zones away from other ones because o\' pollution n\' noise.
tap on dis button t\' see detailed demand information fer every zone type.
ye can change simulation speed in order t\' shorten waiting time.
just set it back t\' normal speed.
yer task be it t\' gain doubloons from taxes t\' enlarge yer city.
tap at thar bottom starboard corner t\' get more information about yer doubloons or t\' change taxes.
congratulations, ye learned thar basics o\' theotown. now ye can start yer own city :)
cars may only drive in one direction on dis road type. use it t\' control traffic.
there\'s a fire in yer town! build fire departments t\' extinguish thar fire.
a destroyed structure. ye should remove it.
let a meteorite fall from thar sky.
please, give me a penny, me need it so much :(
a vast meteorite crater. ye should remove it.
a puny meteorite crater. ye should remove it.
ye may support us by tapping on ads :)
tornados be a great danger fer yer city.
a residential zone wit\' higher density.
a commercial zone wit\' high density.
a cheap zone fer farm buildings. minimum size fer farms be 4x4.
can only be built one time
high education be provided by high schools.
influence o\' fire departmens reduces thar probabilty o\' fires.
doctors help t\' keep yer inhabitants healthy.
nobody wants t\' live in a noisy area.
makes yer inhabitants grog-filled n\' allow a higher building density.
nobody wants t\' live in a polluted area.
creed increases thar attribute o\' yer inhabitants.
industry area fer thar waterfront o\' yer city.
shows buildin\'s that may nay be removed.
a nice residential fer thar mayor.
a town hall would suit yer town.
a village square fer yer townhall.
has t\' be built near water.
decreases grog pollution by releasing wasted grog t\' thar nature. has a bad influence.
cities will be saved in internal storage. ye will have nay access t\' them.
helps ships t\' find thar way.
more powerful than a coal power plant. a lot more expensive t\' maintain n\' it be needed a lot o\' grog fer cooling. may explode without water.
cheaper than other power plants. little pollution.
some entertaintment fer thar habitants o\' theotown.
there\'s nay doubloons left. ye may take some loans.
railways be a great way t\' lessen traffic on yer roads. build stations in different areas o\' yer city n\' connect \'em using railways.
a puny elementary school fer puny villes.
use dis tool in order t\' remove zone definition.
prevents n\' extinguishes fires. has puny radius n\' only one car.
starts a riot which can only be stopped by police swat teams.
have a wonderful day at thar beach.
scallywags want t\' live in our town. declare a residential zone fer them.
build a commercial zone so commercials may build in our city.
industries may build in our city, but ye have t\' declare zones fer \'em first.
dis police station will lead t\' silence n\' order in yer city.
some buildin\'s don\'t have a road connection. ye should fix this.
our jolly crew have some verily polluted grog here!
theotown has developed a lot since dis city has been created. it might therefore nay duty as expected. please don\'t hate us (◕‿◕✿)
low health. ye should improve environment values or build a medic station.
enter thar new name fer yer city here.
enter thar new name fer dis building.
sorry, yer device has nay sufficient amount o\' ram t\' run theotown.
d\' ye want t\' save yer progress afore closing?
enter a name fer thar copy.
our jolly crew have some crime here. ye should build more police stations or improve happiness.
maybe our jolly crew should improve traffic by building a main road. select thar land road.
tap on thar start n\' thar end point o\' thar planned road. see how a bridge will be built automaticially o\'er thar river.
have a wonderful day at thar beach.
if there\'s a riot only swat teams can hande it.
there\'s a riot fer nay reason!
there\'s a demonstration in our town because o\' %1s! d\' something or something bad will happen!
thar perfect road t\' connect distant areas.
scallywags here be unhappy because o\' %1$s. ye should try t\' improve thar happiness.
n\' thar rest o\' our community
convert city into developer mode?\n\nthis cannot be undone!
congratulations, yer city %1$s reached a new rank:
helicopters may land n\' start here.\n\nincreases thar range o\' thar fire department.
all settings will be lost. be ye sure?
removes thar ads at thar bottom o\' thar screen.
a unidentified flying object attacks yer city!
our jolly crew have a new currency: theons ͳ
duty in progress. d\' nay cross thar line.
me will build me own city wit\' skyscrapers n\' parks
may thar force be wit\' ye
our jolly crew now have plugins
a bigger high school fer more students.
in dis game mode ye start wit\' a lot o\' doubloons n\' it\'s a little bit easier overall.
default game mode. ye start wit\' a jolly good amount o\' doubloons n\' it shouldn\'t be t\' difficult t\' build thar city o\' yer dreams.
be ye a pro in theotown? then dis be thar starboard mode fer you. ye start wit\' a puny amount o\' doubloons n\' it\'s difficult overall.
our jolly crew have t\' improve %1$s happiness so %2$s can move into our city.
ye can unlock dis rank immediately, if ye want to.
some puny residential, commercial n\' industrial buildin\'s fer more variety in yer city. includes graphics fer winter time.
it looks as if these diamonds be yours now.
d\' ye want t\' connect dis road t\' other cities?
d\' ye want t\' unlock dis area t\' create a new city here?
at least %1$,d inhabitants in thar region needed.
highway built n\' paid by thar state.
land road built n\' paid by thar state.
d\' ye want t\' reset dis city t\' it\'s original state? dis cannot be undone.
one-way road built n\' paid by thar state.
yer city be just part o\' something bigger. here ye can see all o\' yer cities.

in theotown our jolly crew discriminate building demand fer different building types n\' different levels. building types be residential, commercial n\' industrial. there be three levels, poor (ͳ), medium (ͳͳ) n\' rich (ͳͳͳ).
welcome t\' yer first town.\n\ntry t\' get 300 inhabitants.
congratulations yer city reached a new rank.\n\neach rank unlocks some buildin\'s n\' ye get a reward.

dear player,

we recently made a lot o' progress in theotown. unfortunately, dis wouldn't be possible if our jolly crew didn't add a special currency as well as changes t' game dynamics which may break some barnacle-covered cities.

we hope ye understand. our jolly crew have something as thank-you gift fer you.
cannot unlock more than %1$,d maps at once.
it\'s a lot o\' duty t\' unlock a map. may ye want us t\' support us? dis can reduce unlocking time by 30 minutes.
our jolly crew be currently unlocking dis map fer you.
enter here a new name fer thar region:
a vast city hall fer a vast city. it\'s a thank ye fer 1 m downloads.
dis grog pump stands in polluted area. our jolly crew better place it somewhere else in order t\' keep grog clean.
our jolly crew better dispose o\' dis rubbish afore someone notices it.
me think it\'s time t\' give our children some education. build a elementary school.
let\'s get some genius by building a high school.
allows ye t\' use faster game speed fer %1$s.
there\'s too much traffic on dis road. me recommend t\' build more or better roads.
dis school be full. build more o\' them, please.
our jolly crew have nay enough doubloons t\' buy this.\n\ndo ye want t\' get thar missing %1$s immediately?
there\'s nay enough space in dis hospital. our jolly crew have t\' build another one.
then rate us please. it takes just a moment.
any suggestions how our jolly crew can improve thar game? please tell us.
would ye like t\' skip %1$,d days?
build yer own military base t\' protect yer city. includes a ufo disaster.
science! our jolly crew found a solution t\' improve game resolution. would ye like t\' use it?\n\nthis can be changed in thar settings any time.
military buildin\'s may only be placed within dis zone.
a road dedicated t\' military vehicles n\' emergency cars. ye might nay build other roads in military area.
thar headquarters be thar most important building o\' yer military base.
can be used t\' shoot ufos. may nay be used t\' shoot civil buildin\'s or vehicles.
thar government would like t\' d\' some rocket testing in yer town. as dis may lead t\' disasters ye get a compensation fer thar risk.
dis puny mountain be a tourist attraction in dis mostly flat land.
dis puny mountain be a tourist attraction in dis mostly flat land.
d\' ye want t\' establish a connection t\' thar outside?
oops...i\'m afraid our last rocket test issued a galactic disaster.
mayor, our jolly crew need ye t\' spend all thar money!
vast residential, commercial n\' industrial buildin\'s fer more variety in thar city. boosts living standard o\' yer inhabitants.
enter a name fer dis area.
enter a new text fer yer label or delete it at all.
create, edit n\' remove labels wit\' dis tool.
some decorations fer yer commercial area.
a slower speed mode which gives ye more control fer certain situations.
just some sand. also used fer beaches.
a fire station wit\' huge radius, a lot o\' cars n\' a helipad upgrade fer a helicopter.
what about some motor sports in yer town? will also spawn go-carts on normal road.
has huge radius n\' many cars. useful t\' prevent or extinguish fires.
what about some motor sports in yer town? will also spawn go-carts on normal road.
what a lovely place, isn\'t it?
however, let\'s build a vast city, but maybe our jolly crew should start slowly.
tap on thar screen t\' move thar map. ye can zoom wit\' two fingers.
great, me think ye have some feeling fer thar controls now. so our jolly crew can start wit\' yer first city.
how convenient, thar nation has already built some roads here, so our jolly crew can use \'em fer free.
let\'s declare a residential area here. scallywags will build houses on their own then.
better our jolly crew surround thar area wit\' some roads. scallywags will only build near roads.
now our jolly crew have t\' wait fer scallywags t\' move into our town.
hey, what\'s that? looks as if someone has nay energy!
o\' course not. our jolly crew have nay energy source, yet. let\'s build some solar panels near thar highway.
now our jolly crew need some wires t\' connect thar residential area wit\' thar panels.
construction o\' thar panels takes some time. ye can either wait or tap on it t\' accelerate building process fer free.
ok, our jolly crew have energy now. but wait, what\'s that? scallywags also want t\' have water?
it\'s nay that difficult. let\'s build a grog tower t\' provide some water.
here our jolly crew also have t\' wait fer thar building t\' complete. instead o\' waiting our jolly crew might buy it fer diamonds.
fer grog our jolly crew use pipes t\' transport it t\' yer buildings. build some fer future purposes.
great, our jolly crew have now some inhabitants wit\' power n\' water. but wait, something be still missing...
mayor, our jolly crew have nay jobs nor a place t\' buy things!
alright, our jolly crew also need commercial n\' industrial zones. let\'s have a look into thar demand overview.
here ye can see demand fer res (residential), com (commercial) n\' ind (industrial) buildings.
fer each type (res, com or ind)) there be three levels o\' wealth: ͳ, ͳͳ n\' ͳͳͳ which correspond t\' poor, medium n\' rich.
o\' course our jolly crew want t\' have rich inhabitants only, but our jolly crew have t\' start slowly. as ye can see our jolly crew need some ͳ commercials fer now.
declaring some more commercial zones? me think ye can d\' that.
well done! according t\' thar demand graph there\'s demand fer industrial zone, now. let\'s declare it short o\' our residential area.
on average ye need as much commercial n\' industrial zones as ye have residential ones.
ye may have noticed that it\'s easy t\' lose clear view in yer city. therefore me would like t\' present you: thar minimap
great. let\'s have a look into other magic stuff.
here ye can see general information about yer city. ye can rename it by tapping on it\'s current name.
another useful tool be dis one.
it shows ye details about thar happiness o\' yer inhabitants.
wouldn\'t it be shipshape t\' be thar master o\' time? try t\' make anything faster.
n\' now sail back t\' normal speed...
i\'m yarr t\' interrupt you, but there\'s also non magical stuff. doubloons fer example.
here me give ye a short overview about our money. our jolly crew can earn doubloons by taxes, so it\'s in our interest t\' get more inhabitants.
in some cases our jolly crew might have t\' take a loan... let\'s hope that dis won\'t happen.
me think our jolly crew have enough money...for now. let\'s focus more on building. lets build some parks. scallywags like parks.
oops, that\'s one park more than me wanted. let\'s remove one.
jolly good work, so far. now me want t\' present ye thar rank indicator. it shows ye thar current rank o\' yer city.
gain inhabitants n\' solve disasters t\' reach thar next rank. dis way ye can unlock more buildings.
about disasters, they will happen... ye can access action forces via dis tab, when available.
t\' make things visible ye can use dis tab.
me told ye most o\' thar things me know. but one important thing left: there be presents
you\'ll get a present fer free every day.
if you\'re searching fer a great community, ye will find it on www.theotown.com
gives ye limited ability fer super fast game speed.
ye can use super fast game speed fer a longer time.
you\'re thar ultimate master o\' all times. gives ye great stamina fer super fast speed usage.
uses some top secret technology t\' control weather.
uses some top secret technology! ye can use it t\' control weather.
a military blocker\' of people fer decoration purposes.
build yer own city in dis city simulation game.

d\' ye want t\' build yer own city? in theotown ye can watch yer own city growing. declare zones fer residential, commercial or industrial buildin\'s n\' build road t\' connect them. make yer city more attractive by building parks, schools n\' many more facilities. if ye provide theotown access t\' external storage, it will save cities in thar directory theotown/maps on yer device so ye have access t\' them.
a huge fog machine that can generate fog fer thar whole city.
sometimes trees have t\' be replanted if thar environment be too polluted. thar forester\'s lodge replants trees automatically.
sometimes trees have t\' be replanted if thar environment be too polluted. dis house replants trees automatically.
inhabitants feel safe near bunkers. at least they\'re fireproof.
build yer airport within dis airfield zone.
just some letters t\' give %1$s a personal touch.
some placeable letters that can be used fer decorative purposes.
ye may have t\' restart thar app t\' properly change thar language.
a wonderful fountain that will delight thar inhabitants o\' %1$s n\' you, too.
a wonderful fountain that will delight thar inhabitants o\' yer town n\' also you.
vast wires fer a lot o\' energy. fer regional energy exchange.
a transformer be needed t\' transform betwixt high n\' normal voltage. build it near a transmission line.
come t\' thar light side, our jolly crew have icecream
every pixel be made by hook
may contain traces o\' hard duty
allow gameplay upload without wifi connection (may be expensive!)
enter a new name fer yer airplane:
a long range airplane from theoair.
a golden variant o\' thar long range airplane from theoair.
make yer airport more realistic wit\' these decorations.
ye have t\' build a tower in order t\' control yer airport
ye have t\' ensure that yer tower be working
add a new lane fer yer airport
only one lane at a time can be added
enter a new name fer yer lane:
enter yer redeem code here t\' redeem it:
thar entered redeem code could nay be redeemed. please check fer typing errors.
a airport needs at least one tower t\' duty properly.
a airport needs a entry so scallywags can come into it.
gates be needed fer incoming/outgoing passengers.
a runway where planes can start n\' land. minimum length be 12.
a double-deck, long range airplane from theoair. it has a lot o\' space.
would ye like t\' shorten dis waiting time a bit?\n%1$s left.
please help us n\' rate theotown
wit\' thar starter package you\'ll receive:
login t\' allow us t\' synchronize yer profile.
use dis road t\' connect yer gates wit\' yer runways.
just a present. try t\' tap on it.
ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume nay everything in sight.
ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume everything in sight.
a hydroelectric power plant that can be used t\' create electricity using thar power o\' rivers. does nay generate pollution.
slime disasters will eat up yer city. o\' course, only if ye want it t\' d\' so.
thar christmas tree will fill thar hearts o\' yer inhabitants wit\' joy n\' glory. d\' ye see any presents?
thar jardine house be a office tower placed in hong kong. it has 52 floors n\' has a height o\' 179 m. it be completed in 1972.
thar bank o\' china tower in hong kong houses thar headquarters fer thar bank o\' china hk. it has 70 floors, be 367 m high n\' be finished in 1990.
children like t\' build snowmen in winter time.
thar international commerce centre in hong kong be a 108 story, commercial skyscraper. it\'s thar tallest building in hong kong wit\' a height o\' 484 m. it be completed in 2010.
a firework wit\' thar shape o\' a torch.
dis firework mimics thar shape o\' a jellyfish.
a switch t\' initiate fireworks. connect it t\' wires.
place n\' compose yer own fireworks.
a switch that will automatically emit a signal on new year.
a fast long range airplane from theoair.
a red n\' yellow explosion combined wit\' white fade.
a red explosion wit\' a yellow fade out.
a red explosion wit\' a shipshape light effect.
a beautiful explosion wit\' mixed colors n\' a fade out.
three white explosions combined wit\' a red fade out.
vast rockets shot into thar air.
yer first very own helicopter. unfortunately, it won\'t listen t\' you.
looks as if something be stucking in thar ground. better ye remove it.
a radioactive destroyed structure. ye should remove it.
theotown needs access t\' external storage t\' save yer progress.
rock be falling from thar sky!
our jolly crew have a nuclear explosion starboard here!
by enabling gameplay upload ye allow us t\' upload yer gameplay t\' our servers. see thar disclaimer fer more information.
would ye like t\' unlock dis bus immediately?
d\' ye want t\' place dis building here?
thar brandenburg gate be a german landmark that be built in thar 18th century. it\'s located in berlin.
ye dismissed multiple tasks, so would ye like t\' disable \'em fer dis city?
thar arc de triomphe in paris honours those who fought n\' died in thar french revolution.
drastic reduce o\' building time fer all buildings.
watch a short video t\' boost building time fer %s.
thar eiffel tower in paris be thar most prominent landmark o\' france. thar tower be 324 metres tall n\' be finished in 1889.
would ye like t\' collect what %1$s earned while ye were absent?\n\n%2$s
shall our jolly crew build that?
want t\' save some diamonds? dis boost reduces tunnel price by 50%% fer %s.
indicator fer happiness about education availability.
happiness about level o\' neighboring buildings.
happiness about available energy n\' water.
happiness about facilities fer free time.
if scallywags use busses there will be less traffic.
if scallywags use trains there will be less traffic on thar road.
scallywags prefer t\' live in a residential area.
commercials be often groupes togther t\' attract customers.
scallywags don\'t want t\' live nearby.
buildin\'s o\' dis level be usually poor.
buildin\'s o\' dis level be nay that poor.
buildin\'s o\' dis level be usually rich.
high buildin\'s be typically more dense.
parks n\' especially forest have a great nature influence.
waste should be removed in order t\' make ye inhabitants happy..
a simple road on which only buses can drive on.
a one-way road only buses can drive on.
want t\' get some diamonds fer free by watching a ad?
vast ben be a bell tower in london that be 96 m high n\' be built 1859.
thar angel o\' independence be a monument in mexico city that be built in 1910 t\' remember mexico\'s war o\' independence.
thar statue o\' liberty be a gift from thar french t\' thar americans. it be inaugurated in 1886 n\' be 93 meters high.
a barnacle-covered n\' rusty grog tower. it does absolutely nothing.
duty like normal wires, but be placed underground so nobody has t\' see them.
contains thar following buildin\'s fer permanent usage:
a place fer retired aircraft. it\'s dirty but produces some income.
ahoy mayor, did ye forget about yer mission t\' build a great city?
there\'s nay much free space port on yer device (%,d mb).\n\ncities might nay be saved due t\' insufficient space!
thar sydney opera house be a multi-venue performing arts centre that be located in sydney, australia. it be completed in 1973 n\' has a height o\' 65 meters.
thar one raffles place be a skyscraper in thar city o\' singapore that be built in 1986 n\' has a height o\' 280 meters.
thar willis tower (also known as sears tower) be a skyscraper that be located in chicago, united states. thar tower be built in 1973 n\' be 442 meters high.
contains thar following buildin\'s fer permanent usage:
want t\' build a specific road or building again? use dis tool n\' tap on it. nay supported by all structures.
select a building in order t\' move it t\' a new place. nay all buildin\'s can be moved.
be ye sure that ye want t\' delete dis screenshot? dis cannot be undone!

hi, i\'m glad that you\'d like t\' contribute t\' our gallery. however, afore our jolly crew can start ye have t\' say yar too t\' our policy t\' allow us t\' upload screenshots fer you. \n\nonly tap on say yar too if ye say yar too t\' our policy fer screenshot uploading.
thar leaning tower o\' pisa be a bell tower located in thar italian city o\' pisa that be completed in 1372 n\' its height amounts t\' 56 meters.
thar burj al arab be a luxury fleebag inn that be located in dubai, united arab emirates. it be completed in 1999 n\' has a height o\' 321 meters.
thar hearst tower be a office building in new york city that be built in 2006. it has a height o\' 182 meters.
why burn thar garbage or bring it t\' thar landfill if it can be recycled in thar buyback center?
a wild pickle appeared in %s. what will ye d\' about it, mayor?
a rugby field fer rugby fans.
just a easter egg. what will ye d\' about it?
there\'s a easter egg somewhere. can ye find it?
congratulations, ye found thar easter egg :)
ye selected %d diamond priced buildin\'s fer removal. be ye sure that ye want t\' remove them? there\'s a move building tool if ye just want t\' move them.
thar oriental pearl tower be a tv tower in shanghai whose construction be completed in 1994. thar height o\' thar tower amounts t\' 470 meters.
thar shanghai world financial center be a skyscraper that be located in shanghai n\' be completed 2008. it\'s height be 494 meters.
a traditional pagoda wit\' sakura trees. what a lovely place.
thar saint basil\'s cathedral be a church in moscow, russia. it be completed in 1561 n\' be a museum now. it\'s height amounts t\' 115 meters.
tō-ji be a buddhist temple in kyoto, japan. it be completed in 796 n\' it has a height o\' 55 meters.
garbage be nay collected fer dis building.
dis landfill be full! tap on it t\' clear it!
a lot o\' space t\' collect all thar garbage. can only be removed if empty.
swipe on thar garbage t\' clear it.
our jolly crew can clear thar landfill fer you.
quick n\' dirty way t\' get rid o\' all thar garbage.
call thar garbage truck t\' collect garbage from thar road.
use dis tool t\' remove road decoration overlays.
they be essential fer any oasis.
